1.content:
Okay Before We start, let me just say that the world is set on the Dynamax version.
So Pokemon can be turn to giants due to the new device that will make them grow to huge proportions.
_________
So first up Are you the Pokemon or a Human?
1.title: Before we start.

11.content:
Okay, Now that we settle with that issue.
Just one last question before we can start.
Do you want it with Anthro version of themselves or the normal version?
___________

1) Anthro Version: If you choose this, Mostly to put it in simple way, there's no human, (Mostly if you seen any comic of Anthropomorphic creatures) They would take the roles of human ways/ Have Jobs/ Homes etc, In this version u could go wild with the story for whatever pokemon u would like to write about.

2) Non Anthro Version: Basically is just like normal Pokemon either wild or companion for a trainer.
Incase Anthro is not your style and like the pokemon the way they are.
11.title: I choose to be a Pokemon

113.content: Shall it be the divisive, upstart Starlight Glimmer that we follow, Or will the fabulous, radiant Rarity take the spotlight?
113.title: A Unicorn

114.content: is it rainbow dash or is it fluttershy?
114.title: A Pegasus

12.content: Which one of the C.M.C will it be?
12.title: The (C.M.C) Cutie Mark Crusaders

122.content: how does the cow girl grow?
122.title: Apple Bloom

13.content: Which non pony do you want to grow?
13.title: Non Ponies

info.brief_description: Pokemon are GROWING to Kaiju size and more, Thanks to a device that helps them grow...
info.description:
Since Pokemon Dynamax was announce, I was fascinated and hype up about the new pokemon game which make your favorite Pokemon to grow into giant size towering over trees and buildings, so i wanted to make this story, Hope you enjoy.
______________________________________________________________________________________
RULES:
1) Pokemon can be Mean or Gentle or Playful.

2) the Main Pokemon and the owner can't be kill

3) Pokemon in this story happens to enjoy growing BIG, changing their perspective

4) No Grusome deaths nor detailing of how they kill people or die, It will be deleted otherwise

5) Vore/ Feet crush/ Belly Crush / Butt Crush are allow

6) No Bad Grammar nor hard to read text without space within text or after finishing a sentence and not giving space for the new sentence

7) Just like my Previous stories, This one will have multiple scenarios just in case anyone wants to be creative or simply u wanted more than the Dynamax device.

8) The Story ends if the Pokemon return back to their normal size or if you preferred stay at their new size forever.

9) Pokemon can be Anthro or non Anthro/ But depending of the choice every other pokemon in the world would also be anthro or non Anthro

10) no Toilet stuff
